scripts.build:rollup: cd test && rollup main.js --format cjs -o bundles/rollup.bundle.js
scripts.build:browserify-babelify: cd test && browserify main.js -o bundles/browserify-babelify.bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.e:build:rollup: cd test && rollup main-error.js --format cjs -o bundles/rollup.bundle.js
scripts.e:build:browserify-babelify: cd test && browserify main-error.js -o bundles/browserify-babelify.bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build:all: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:browserify
scripts.e:build:all: npm run e:build:webpack && npm run e:build:rollup && npm run e:build:browserify
scripts.build:source: browserify --node -s wooster -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/version2.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build:source && npm run uglify
scripts.test:bundle: cd test && TEST_SOURCE='../dist/bundle.min.js' node test.js | tap-spec
